generous adjective
(CHARACTER)
Add to word list

B1 willing to give money, help, kindness, etc., especially more than is usual or expected: a very generous man [ + to infinitive ] It was generous of you to lend me the money.generous with She's been very generous with her time. There's a generous (= kinder than deserved) review of the book in today's newspaper. Opposite
ungenerous
